Text:
Wearing the magic collar, the cat enters the dark
alley and stops as if it is waiting for someone.

As they hide in the shadows holding their breath,
someone enters the alley and approaches the cat.

(As I suspected, an enemy trying to infiltrate
Mitsugoshi was behind the cat...)

(Master Shadow told me to leave the cat alone, but...
He must have predicted this and wants to take care
of it himself.)

(What kind of foe would be so powerful that it'd be
too much for me to handle? Does Master Shadow
have to take it on alone?)
Meooow.
(Huh?)
Meooow.
Mrrr!
The moonlight unveils the person's identity.
The cat's here again!
(Lady Delta?!)

I glance at Master Shadow in confusion, and he looks
back.
Master Shadow nods without saying a word.

(But why is Lady Delta here? Did Master Shadow
know...?)
You're always here. Do you wait for me every day?
Meooow.

When Lady Delta reaches her hand out,
the cat starts to play with it.
Right! I knew it!

Female cats aren't usually cute at all,
but you're so adorable!
Meooow.

The cat seems to be comfortable around Lady Delta.
It runs up her arms and even onto her shoulders.

Hehe! I'm gonna treat you to an extra special meal
again today!
Meooow!
Let's go to the usual place! Hold on tight, okay?

With the cat on her shoulder, Lady Delta jumps up
and leaves the alley.
Everything happened so quickly.
They're off to...
Mitsugoshi, right?
Maybe they're heading to the roof...
You could be right.

If you ride on Lady Delta's shoulders, you can
easily get to the Mitsugoshi rooftop, right...?

True. There was no hidden entryway... At least it
wouldn't be necessary for Delta.
So the intruder is Lady Delta...

Nu feels her strength leave her. If Master Shadow
hadn't been next to her, she would have collapsed.
Well, I guess that's our conclusion, huh?
But I'm glad Mitsugoshi wasn't in danger.
When Nu hears him say that, her face turns red.
Master Cid...
Yeah?
What?
I-I'm so sorry!

I imagined that there was an intruder and made a big
fuss about it. And to top it all off

I was wrong and I wasted your precious time
all night... I can't apologize enough...
It's fine.
I was curious and decided to tag along with you.
But...!

(Master Shadow decided to come along with me
because he was worried about me...!)

(But his consideration was all for nothing because
the intruder turned out to be Lady Delta...)

She'd made such a huge mess of things for him, her
beloved master, that she wanted to disappear right
then and there.
...I am truly sorry.
Don't take it so seriously.

Anyway, it's totally fine, and now that everything's
settled, I guess I'll head home.
Don't stay out too late, Nu.
With that, Master Shadow disappears without a trace.

Even though I've made such a horrible mistake,
you're still so kind to me, Master Cid
Several days later, on the rooftop of Mitsugoshi...

Nu lets out a sigh as she pets the cat, which is
playing with her carefree.
Meooow.

...You're so oblivious. You've caused me a lot of
trouble, you know.
(But...it's my fault for being so rash...)
I heard Gamma told you off.
M-Master Shadow...!?
Meooow.
There, there.
What are you doing here, Master Cid...?

I came to get chocolates, and then Gamma
apologized to me.
You went out of your way to tell Gamma?

Even though it wasn't an official Shadow Garden
mission, I did something unnecessary and still
failed.

You knew she was going to be angry and still told
her?
I decided that I shouldn't keep quiet.
Don't take it so seriously.
Meooow.
I see you're still taking care of the cat.
Ah...yes.

Lady Delta spoke with Lady Gamma, who allowed us onto
the roof on the condition that Lady Delta takes responsibility
for the cat.
But it is the company employees to who I am thankful.
Is that so?

Yes, and of course, we're happy to care for it.
It's so soothing to spend time with a cat.
I see.
You're still smitten with it?
Heehee, yes, absolutely.
Meooow.
The cat plays with her feet.
(I'm sorry for lashing out at you earlier.)
I think it's fantastic.
Hm? What is?
Your serious side.
You're the only one in the Seven Shadows that has one.
Master Cid...
Meooow.
Hm? Ah, there, there...
(He complimented me...)

(Even though I messed up badly, you praise me for
having a quality different from the Seven Shadows...)

I'm honored to be compared with the Seven Shadows,
Master Cid, but to receive your praise is...

I'm very flattered. I'm still not as talented as
the others, but I'll strive to do my best.
Yep, you definitely have a serious side.
Meooow.
Oh, so you think so too?

Master Shadow, who's busy petting the cat,
will never notice.
I'm the only one that has it...

As she murmured this, she suddenly realizes that she
is smiling.
